analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x2cdb31dd47c47577a3c9e401026989f835dd6c77.sol:
	Contract MyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x2cdb31dd47c47577a3c9e401026989f835dd6c77.sol#209)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/2/0x2cdb31dd47c47577a3c9e401026989f835dd6c77.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
